name: 葉采青
objective:
本課程旨在為學生奠定紮實的英語文法與句型結構基礎，幫助學生掌握不完整句、連寫句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、錯誤平行結構等關鍵文法知識。於此基礎上，課程將進一步培養學生的段落寫作技巧，包括敘述、描述、闡釋和論證等，使學生能撰寫條理分明、結構嚴謹之段落。
This course provides a solid foundation in English grammar and sentence construction, helping students master key grammatical elements like sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism. Building upon this grammatical foundation, this course further develops students’ paragraph writing skills through techniques such as narration, description, exposition, and argumentation, enabling students to craft well-structured paragraphs.
schedule:
Week     Content
1	Orientation
2       Subordination
3-4     Illogical Comparisons and Mixed Constructions
5-6     Mechanics
7       Review
8       Chapter 1: Introduction to Writing
9       Mid-term exam
10-12   Chapter 2: The Writing Process
13-15   Chapter 3: Rhetorical Modes of Writing
16-17   Chapter 4: Writing a Research Paper
18      Final exam
